snippet.title: Misty Copeland heads to Smithsonian to see her own portrait
snippet.description: The American Ballet Theatre soloist dropped by the National Portrait Gallery to take in the "Dancing the Dream" exhibit.

snippet.title: Veep Biden joins Instagram with a styling post
snippet.description: Vice President Biden posts his very first Instagram Wednesday, and it's classic Uncle Joe, sporting his signature sunglasses.

snippet.title: The seductive allure of wars we're not winning
snippet.description: Why Iraq and Afghanistan veterans feel nostalgic for their time in battle.

snippet.title: McAllister video offers up another iconic scandal image
snippet.description: That video of Rep. Vance McAllister (R-La.) smooching a staffer is the latest addition to the National Gallery of Politicians' Shame.

snippet.title: Heartbleed bug causes major security headache
snippet.description: A confounding computer bug called "Heartbleed" is causing major security headaches across the Internet as websites scramble to fix the problem and Web surfers wonder whether they should change their passwords to prevent theft of their email accounts, credit card numbers and other sensitive information.

snippet.title: Actress Julia Louis-Dreyfus appears nude on the cover of Rolling Stone
snippet.description: On the cover of the magazine Julia Louis-Dreyfus has on nothing but a huge U.S. Constitution tattoo.

snippet.title: What you can do about the Heartbleed bug
snippet.description: What can you do about the massive security bug taking over the Internet? To be honest: not much. But here's a catch-up on the few steps you can take.

snippet.title: Beyonce bestie Kelly Rowland spotted on the Hill
snippet.description: Singer Kelly Rowland heads to the Hill to lend her support to the Boys & Girls Club of America.
